verses.name: Ezekiel 31:12
verses.text: And strangers, the terrible of the nations, have cut him off, and have left him: upon the mountains and in all the valleys his branches are fallen, and his boughs are broken by all the rivers of the land; and all the people of the earth are gone down from his shadow, and have left him.

verses.name: Ezekiel 31:13
verses.text: Upon his ruin shall all the fowls of the heaven remain, and all the beasts of the field shall be upon his branches:
